meanings.english_definition: Resembling shells of the genus Pleurotomaria.
A shell resembling those of the genus Pleurotomaria.

usage_notes.explanation: Used in the context of describing or classifying shells based on their similarity to the *Pleurotomaria* genus.

readability_explanation.text: This term is highly specialized and would primarily be encountered in scientific or technical contexts related to malacology (the study of mollusks) or paleontology. It is not a word used in general conversation.
